title: Krakow Art Hotel near Florian Gate and Old Town
description: Mere steps from the picturesque Old Town, enjoy a stay at Hotel Indigo Krakow - Old Town, an IHG Hotel, where heritage architecture merges with inspired design. Wake in a stylish guest room boasting artistic flair inspired by renowned painters. Experience a modern twist on traditional Polish cuisine at Filipa 18 restaurant or stop in for a hearty lunch at Bistro Filipa 18. Wander charming side streets and verdant gardens as you experience the cultural and culinary treasures of Poland.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Krakow - Old Town, an IHG Hotel
